评论详情: I love this backpack purse. It sits on my back nicely and has a great amount of zippers and pockets. Material feels very strong. I was impressed with the pattern in person! There is a nice Zipper on the back of the backpack which is not only extra storage but could be used to keep money or valuables secure.
So cute, perfect size for a backpack purse and fits so much for its size!

This bag has been a lifesaver for me! I am a 5’3” woman and sometimes “normal” sized bags for adults are too big for me and cause constant back issues. However I have a 11.5in Chromebook and decided to give this bag a try since it was considerably smaller by about 5” from the Larger size. And I have ZERO regrets. The bag has great quality stitching, it didn’t stink when it came in, the zippers had plastic wrap on them so they arrived pristinely, smoothly , and scratch free. I also have long hair and I keep my zippers met at the middle top of the main bag and it has never once gotten caught! I love the quilted design for the extra flare, but honestly it is so soft like an actual quilted blanket! The only complaint I have is the straps do fall throughout the day, so you have to readjust them frequently but I’m also forsaken with a larger chest and like to tuck my thumbs under the straps, fingers wrapped around the front of straps, with my elbows tucked in so I could honestly be unconsciously pulling them down. I will take pictures with my bag on so it can hopefully help other women contemplating on if a smaller bag can help them with similar issues!

I love the design of this backpack, but the straps do not stay tightened. It’s annoying having to retighten the straps every time you use the backpack, but other than that it’s good. It has lots of pockets. It’s a little flimsy at times when you don’t have a lot in it but other than that the durability is pretty good.
I got this backpack for work. I really like it! Very spacious! Thank you !! 😊
So far I the love the bag! Order the medium size and surprisingly its very roomy.  My only complaint is when I adjust the straps they move while I  walking.
Cute backpack and I love aliens. There are lots of pockets for storage and the straps are adjustable.
